item.endrem.old_eye.description: §7§oLegends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Bee Queens.
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: §7§oNot attainable - from a land that no longer exists.
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: §7§oIt was lost by a demon in the battle between the Aether and the Nether
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: §7§oA hardened ball of of extremely old thermal paste.
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oFound in the pockets of either the Summoner or Alchemist. You forget which.
item.endrem.black_eye.description: §7§oYou found this somewhere in Everbright or Everdawn
item.endrem.lost_eye.description: §7§oIt is said that an even more powerful version of this eye used to exist, but someone accidentally tapped Q over lava and destroyed it.
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oYou're surprised that putting all these materials into the Infusion Injector even worked.
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: §7§oNot attainable - from a land that no longer exists.
item.endrem.exotic_eye.description: §7§oFrom a land that used to be mysterious.
item.endrem.evil_eye.description: §7§oNot attainable - from a land that no longer exists.
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oA relic of the distant past. You notice that there is some pocket lint on it.
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: §7§oNobody knows how to attain this eye.
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: §7§oAfter lighting the Spirit Fire, this is what remained of the Demon's Dream Fruit.
block.endrem.ender_eye.throw_warning: This eye doesn't know where to go
block.endrem.ender_eye.use_warning: This eye doesn't want to be used
block.endrem.custom_eye.frame_has_eye: This frame already has an eye
block.endrem.custom_eye.broken: This portal is not built properly
